venueName: The Beach Club at Charleston Harbor Resort and Marina

pages.text: Begin Your Happily Ever After at our Beautiful Charleston Wedding Venue Blending southern charm with breathtaking waterfront views, Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina is the wedding destination of your dreams. Beyond weddings, many of life’s most precious moments are celebrated with us. Our surroundings and stellar service ensure beautiful and lasting memories of your special anniversary, birthday, graduation, or any event you'll hold dear forever. Stylish Venues for Events of Distinction Choose from 9 inspired venues, including our private beach that capture the essence of the Lowcountry and the beauty of the downtown Charleston skyline. No matter which venue you choose, you can trust that our experienced, knowledgeable team will make the planning process effortless by assisting with everything from event space setup and design, to guidance in making the perfect menu selection. Our wedding and event venues offer everything needed for creating cherished memories and entertaining guests with luxury and style. Link to Indoor Venues Our Indoor Venues The Yacht Club & Bridge Bar The Yacht Club features 2,100 square feet of beautiful space, made almost entirely of windows that offer views of the Charleston Harbor Marina and downtown skyline. The nautical feel of the space is ideal for any celebration, with reclaimed wood plank floors and drop ceilings with stained wood beams. The built-in sound system ensures a flawless presentation or night of dancing. Bridge Bar is an open- air space connected to the Yacht Club overlooking the USS Yorktown and historic Charleston skyline Details & Capacities: 2,100 sq. ft. | U-Shape/Board – 65/70 | Theater – 175 | Classroom – 100 | Rounds of 10 – 120 | Crescent Rounds – 90 | Reception – 80 Sunrise Terrace & Deck This 2,400 SQFT, climate-controlled space boasts a stunning view of the Charleston harbor, marina, and downtown skyline through picture windows. The Sunrise Terrace can be enjoyed as is with a simple, yet classic indoor setting or can be transformed to an indoor/outdoor dream with windows that open in full accordion style. Whether the windows are open or not, this space offers unobstructed 180° views for a wedding reception of up to 150 guests or up to 250 for a standing reception with heavy hors d’oeuvres. Details & Capacities: 2,400 SQFT. | Theater – 250 | Rounds of 10 – 150 | Reception – 180 Charleston Harbor Fish House Porch The Porch at our on-site restaurant offers 1,340 square feet of private dining space, complete with climate control and large screen doors that can be opened seasonally to let the fresh harbor breeze flow through. Existing seating can accommodate up to 72 people, or we can arrange the space in a reception-style layout for up to 100. The Harbor Room at Charleston Harbor Fish House The USS Yorktown and Ravenel Bridge are your backdrops when you choose the Harbor Room at Charleston Harbor Fish House. This semi-private dining space is located off the main dining room and can accommodate up to 44 guests. Atlantic Ballroom Our 1,700-square-foot ballroom opens onto the Harbor Terrace and looks out over the pool, beach, and harbor. It provides an intimate atmosphere for up to 80 guests for served lunches and dinners or 150 guests for standing receptions. Details & Capacities: 1,700 sq. ft. | U-Shape/Board – 45/48 | Theater – 165 | Classroom – 88 | Rounds of 10 – 120 | Crescent Rounds – 72 | Reception –150 Link to Outdoor Venues Our Outdoor Venues Harborside Beach Whether you’re planning a casual or elegant affair, Harborside Beach is the perfect setting. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Charleston Harbor and historic downtown skyline while celebrating a wedding ceremony or reception, themed party, concert, or other social soiree. Details & Capacities: 21,600 sq. ft. | Theater – 650 | Rounds of 10 – 500 | Reception – 1,900 Lookout Pavilion Our premier outdoor venue, the Lookout Pavilion and its adjacent lawn are perfect for wedding ceremonies, receptions, concerts, carnivals, teambuilding events and more. The Pavilion features a wood-burning fireplace and its own private restrooms, and can comfortably host up to 350 for a seated meal or 550 for a standing reception. If you book the covered area and lawn, events can grow to more than 1,000 guests. Details & Capacities: 4,900 sq. ft. | Theater – 560 | Classroom – 280 | Rounds of 10 – 350 | Crescent Rounds – 210 | Reception – 1,000 Beach Club Events Lawn Our newest ceremony space features a manicured lawn and garden and views of the marina, Cooper River, and USS Yorktown. It’s perfect for sunset weddings or photo shoots. Details & Capacities: 1,685 sq. ft. | Theater – 165 | Rounds of 10 – 120 | Reception –150 Contact us to begin planning your wedding or special event at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina. Choose Your Stay Link for CTA-Item1 The Beach Club Check Availability Link for CTA-Item2 Harborside Check Availability

Enjoy Fabulous Cuisine & Cocktails at Our Charleston Resort Whether you are staying at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina or are just out for a relaxing dinner by the water, we have all your dining needs covered. Sip on a cocktail by the pool from our Tiki Bar. Enjoy a casual meal and some conversation with the locals at the Reel Bar. Or take in unparalleled views while trying some of the freshest seafood in town at the Charleston Harbor Fish House. Link to Charleston Harbor Fish House Charleston Harbor Fish House Fresh Seafood. Fresh Drinks. Fresh Air. Voted one of the “Top 25 Restaurants in Charleston” by , the Fish House is Charleston’s premier location for waterfront dining. The menu, which changes seasonally, offers a variety of options from both land and sea, with a focus on featuring the freshest catches of the day and locally sourced ingredients whenever possible. This on-resort restaurant is open daily for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Charleston Living Magazine WEBSITE Hours of Operation: Breakfast Buffet Hours: 7am- 10:30am Lunch Hours: 11:30am - 3pm* Dinner Hours: 4:30pm - 9pm Sunday - Thursday | 4:30pm - 10pm Friday & Saturday Reservations Strongly Recommended for Dinner *Limited menu from 3:00 PM to 4:30 PM Please click to view Fish House Menu. HERE Bridge Bar The Bridge Bar is the only rooftop bar overlooking the entire Charleston skyline, as well as the Ravenel Bridge and USS Yorktown. This view, combined with great cocktails and flavorful appetizers, makes our open-air bar the place to be. Stop in with family and friends for a memorable night in the friendliest city in the U.S. Open 5pm-9pm Monday- Thursday Open 4pm - 10pm Saturday-Sunday *excluding days of event rental & weather permitting please call 843-284-7019 to inquire Reel Bar Whether you’re hungry for a quick bite or thirsty for a refreshing cocktail, a visit to the Reel Bar is sure to please. Complete with an impressive display of antique tackle gear, the Reel Bar offers the ideal locale to relax and unwind while dipping your toes in the sand. Hours of Operation: | Monday - Thursday (Food available: 5pm - 10pm) 4pm - 10pm | Friday (Food available: 5pm-10pm) 4pm - 12am |Saturday (Food available: 5pm-10pm) 12pm - 12am | Sunday (Food available: 12pm-10pm) 12pm - 10pm Live music is Thursday & Friday 6-9pm and Sundays 2-6pm at Reel bar Please view the Reel Bar Menu below! Private Dining & Events at Charleston Harbor Fish House Charleston waterways are the perfect backdrop for any special event. Host a birthday, corporate event, anniversary, or other special occasion in our Mount Pleasant restaurant and treat your guests to a delicious meal, tasty cocktails, and stunning views. We have four distinct areas available for private parties of up to 150 guests. Contact our Group Sales Coordinator at or for more details. #1 Resort in South Carolina, Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards #2 Resort in the South, Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards #4 Waterfront Hotel, USA Today 10Best Readers’ Choice Awards #6 Hotel Spa in the US, USA Today 10Best Readers’ Choice Awards One of the Best Hotels in the World, Fodor’s Travel Stay at Our Stunning Mount Pleasant Resort From the palmetto tree-lined entrance on Patriots Point Road to the tropical landscape at our seaside resort, your arrival at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina sets the stage for a truly unique and memorable experience. Whether traveling for business or on a leisure vacation, time spent at the Beach Club, is destined to be a grand experience. Our Luxury Mount Pleasant Hotel Is an Oasis in The South Experience the true South at our one-of-a-kind waterfront hotel in Charleston, which offers 92 guestrooms and all the luxury amenities you need for a relaxing getaway in a lovely coastal setting. The Beach Club’s architecture and design complements the historic Mount Pleasant Village and highlights the unique Lowcountry design aesthetic, complete with grand wraparound porches that are sure to be a favorite spot for winding down after a long day. The porch is perfect for enjoying handcrafted cocktails and light fare highlighting locally sourced ingredients, all while taking in gorgeous views of the marina, historic sites, and Charleston skyline. The Beach Club delivers an authentic Charleston experience complemented by gracious, personalized service and high-end accommodations. Waterfront Luxury Is Yours at Beach Club Here at the Beach Club, the only resort of its kind in the area, we make the ordinary extraordinary and create the grandest of memories for you and yours. Relax with a couple’s massage at the Estuary Spa. Enjoy some friendly competition playing bocce on our private seaside court or chess on our life-size outdoor chess board. Soak up the sun or lounge in a private cabana by our pool. Take the Charleston Water Taxi from our marina to the historic downtown area for a day of exploring. No matter what you do during your stay, it’s sure to be memorable. Accommodations at the Beach Club Our guest rooms and suites feature upscale furnishings with hand-painted elements complemented by a coastal palette that provides a tranquil environment you’ll never want to leave. Unwind on the stylish seating of your oversized patio or balcony, rest easy in our custom-made beds with luxurious bedding, and refresh in a deep soaking tub or shower with Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities. ® Link to Rooms & Suites Guestroom Types Family Parlor Room This 750-square-foot suite is uniquely designed for families or guests desiring more space. It features a king bed and sitting area and a separate room with with two twin beds, as well as a fireplace, one bathroom with a deep soaking tub and separate walk-in shower, and a balcony for additional outdoor space. Book Now Garden Studio The Garden Studio Suite offers 580 square feet of living space designed to meet your every need. It is richly appointed with a king bed, adjacent seating area, oversize soaking tub with separate shower, fireplace, and spacious private balcony with seating. Book Now Harbor Deluxe Room Our Harbor Deluxe Room is designed with your relaxation in mind. Each room features 535 square feet of space with one king bed or two queen beds, a deep soaking tub and separate shower, a fireplace, and elegant Charleston décor. Additionally, a 120-square-foot balcony overlooking the Charleston Harbor and our waterfront pool deck is the perfect place to sip your morning coffee or enjoy a glass of wine after exploring the city. Book Now Patio Deluxe Room The Patio Deluxe Room is ideal for a romantic vacation or weekend getaway for two. This ground-level, poolside room offers 535 square feet of beautifully decorated space, complete with a king bed, fireplace, shower, and spacious patio offering views of the pool and harbor. Enjoy Fabulous Cuisine & Cocktails at Our Charleston Resort Whether you are staying at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina or are just out for a relaxing dinner by the water, we have all your dining needs covered. Sip on a cocktail by the pool from our Tiki Bar. Enjoy a casual meal and some conversation with the locals at the Reel Bar. Or take in unparalleled views while trying some of the freshest seafood in town at the Charleston Harbor Fish House. Link to Charleston Harbor Fish House Charleston Harbor Fish House Fresh Seafood. Fresh Drinks. Fresh Air. Voted one of the “Top 25 Restaurants in Charleston” by , the Fish House is Charleston’s premier location for waterfront dining. The menu, which changes seasonally, offers a variety of options from both land and sea, with a focus on featuring the freshest catches of the day and locally sourced ingredients whenever possible. This on-resort restaurant is open daily for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
